title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 817.9 - Savings and renewal clause
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 817.9 - Savings and renewal clause

State Regulations

Any operating certificate issued by the Office prior to the
promulgation of this Part for the operation of a program subject to regulations
of the former Part 818 shall remain in effect until the term of such operating
certificate has been renewed or such operating certificate is suspended or
revoked through process of law, at which time any recertification of such
program or renewal of such operating certificate shall be pursuant to the
provisions of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
817.9

Adopted

New

York State Register March 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 13, eff. 3/27/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
